Package model

Class KnowledgeCapsule

java.lang.Object
model.KnowledgeCapsule
public class KnowledgeCapsule extends Object
This method represents a capsule that is registered in a phase.

  • Constructor Details

    • KnowledgeCapsule

      public KnowledgeCapsule(String id, String description, Collaborator collaborator, String learnedLesson, int capsuleTypeOption)
      the constructor method.
      Parameters:
      id - : String the unique identifier of the knowledge capsule.
      description - : String the description of the situation during a phase.
      collaborator - : Collaborator the collaborator that registered the knowledge capsule
      learnedLesson - : String the collaborators learned lesson in a certain situation during a phase
      capsuleTypeOption - : int the option that represents the type of the capsule.
